segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 3
segments.en: Numbered Discourses 3

segments.pli: 6. Brāhmaṇavagga
segments.en: 6. Brahmins

segments.pli: 56. Palokasutta
segments.en: 56. Falling Apart

segments.pli: Atha kho aññataro brāhmaṇamahāsālo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami … pe … ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so brāhmaṇamahāsālo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
segments.en: Then a well-to-do Brahmin went up to the Buddha, and seated to one side he said to him:

segments.pli: “sutaṃ metaṃ, bho gotama, pubbakānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ vuddhānaṃ mahallakānaṃ ācariyapācariyānaṃ bhāsamānānaṃ:
segments.en: “Master Gotama, I have heard that brahmins of the past who were elderly and senior, the teachers of teachers, said:

segments.pli: ‘pubbe sudaṃ ayaṃ loko avīci maññe phuṭo ahosi manussehi, kukkuṭasaṃpātikā gāmanigamarājadhāniyo’ti.
segments.en: ‘In the old days this world was as crowded as hell, just full of people. The villages, towns and capital cities were no more than a chicken’s flight apart.’

segments.pli: Ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo yenetarahi manussānaṃ khayo hoti, tanuttaṃ paññāyati, gāmāpi agāmā honti, nigamāpi anigamā honti, nagarāpi anagarā honti, janapadāpi ajanapadā hontī”ti?
segments.en: What is the cause, sir, what is the reason why these days human numbers have dwindled, a decline in population is evident, and whole villages, towns, cities, and countries have disappeared?”

segments.pli: “Etarahi, brāhmaṇa, manussā adhammarāgarattā visamalobhābhibhūtā micchādhammaparetā.
segments.en: “These days, brahmin, humans just love illicit desire. They’re overcome by immoral greed, and mired in wrong thoughts.

segments.pli: Te adhammarāgarattā visamalobhābhibhūtā micchādhammaparetā tiṇhāni satthāni gahetvā aññamaññaṃ jīvitā voropenti, tena bahū manussā kālaṃ karonti.
segments.en: Taking up sharp knives, they murder each other. And so many people perish.

segments.pli: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, hetu ayaṃ paccayo yenetarahi manussānaṃ khayo hoti, tanuttaṃ paññāyati, gāmāpi agāmā honti, nigamāpi anigamā honti, nagarāpi anagarā honti, janapadāpi ajanapadā honti.
segments.en: This is the cause, this is the reason why these days human numbers have dwindled.

segments.pli: Puna caparaṃ, brāhmaṇa, etarahi manussā adhammarāgarattā visamalobhābhibhūtā micchādhammaparetā.
segments.en: Furthermore, because these days humans just love illicit desire …

segments.pli: Tesaṃ adhammarāgarattānaṃ visamalobhābhibhūtānaṃ micchādhammaparetānaṃ devo na sammādhāraṃ anuppavecchati.
segments.en: the heavens don’t provide enough rain,

segments.pli: Tena dubbhikkhaṃ hoti dussassaṃ setaṭṭhikaṃ salākāvuttaṃ.
segments.en: so there’s famine, a bad harvest, with blighted crops that turn to straw.

segments.pli: Tena bahū manussā kālaṃ karonti.
segments.en: And so many people perish.

segments.pli: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, hetu ayaṃ paccayo yenetarahi manussānaṃ khayo hoti, tanuttaṃ paññāyati, gāmāpi agāmā honti, nigamāpi anigamā honti, nagarāpi anagarā honti, janapadāpi ajanapadā honti.
segments.en: This is the cause, this is the reason why these days human numbers have dwindled.

segments.pli: Puna caparaṃ, brāhmaṇa, etarahi manussā adhammarāgarattā visamalobhābhibhūtā micchādhammaparetā.
segments.en: Furthermore, because these days humans just love illicit desire …

segments.pli: Tesaṃ adhammarāgarattānaṃ visamalobhābhibhūtānaṃ micchādhammaparetānaṃ yakkhā vāḷe amanusse ossajjanti, tena bahū manussā kālaṃ karonti.
segments.en: native spirits let vicious monsters loose. And so many people perish.

segments.pli: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, hetu ayaṃ paccayo yenetarahi manussānaṃ khayo hoti, tanuttaṃ paññāyati, gāmāpi agāmā honti, nigamāpi anigamā honti, nagarāpi anagarā honti, janapadāpi ajanapadā hontī”ti.
segments.en: This is the cause, this is the reason why these days human numbers have dwindled.”

segments.pli: “Abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama … pe …
segments.en: “Excellent, Master Gotama! Excellent! …

segments.pli: upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
segments.en: From this day forth, may Master Gotama remember me as a lay follower who has gone for refuge for life.”

segments.pli: Chaṭṭhaṃ.
